regeneration.messages.cannot_use: You cannot use this right now!
regeneration.messages.cant_glow: You cannot activate a glowing hand without being in a grace period
regeneration.messages.fall_dmg: Fall damage reduced due to post regen state! Although you're gonna feel sick..
regeneration.messages.healed: You have given %s some of your Regeneration Energy!
regeneration.messages.jar: You have gained a Regeneration from harvested lindos!
regeneration.messages.jar_no_break: You cannot break this Jar while it has %s Lindos Energy!
regeneration.messages.jar_not_enough: There is not enough Lindos in this jar! [100 Lindos = 1 free Regeneration]
regeneration.messages.new_skin: Your skin will change next Regeneration!
regeneration.messages.not_alive: You cannot transfer regens in this state!
regeneration.messages.now_timelord: You are now a Time lord!
regeneration.messages.post_ended: Your Regeneration process is now entirely completed!
regeneration.messages.reduced_dmg: Reduced Damage due to Post Regen State!
regeneration.messages.regen_warning: Punch a block to delay your regeneration further
regeneration.messages.transfer.full_watc: You can't store anymore regenerations in this watch!
regeneration.messages.transfer.max_regen: You already have the maximum number of regenerations
regeneration.messages.transfer.no_regens: You don't have any regenerations left to transfer
regeneration.messages.transfer.success: You've transferred one of your regenerations into the watch
regeneration.messages.warning.grace: You are in a state of grace, press %s to regenerate!
regeneration.messages.warning.grace_crit: You are near death, press %s to regenerate!
regeneration.toast.timelord: You are now a Time lord!
source.regen.lindos: %s consumed lindos hormones! They are reborn!
source.regen.regen_crit: %s died from holding in their regeneration for too long
source.regen.regen_heal: %s died by donating too much Regeneration energy...
